verses.verse: I <WG1473> therefore <WG3767>, the prisoner <WG1198> of <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> you <WG5209> that ye walk <WG4043> <WG5658> worthy <WG516> of the vocation <WG2821> wherewith <WG3739> ye are called <WG2564> <WG5681>,
With <WG3326> all <WG3956> lowliness <WG5012> and <WG2532> meekness <WG4236>, with <WG3326> longsuffering <WG3115>, forbearing <WG430> <WG5740> one another <WG240> in <WG1722> love <WG26>;
Endeavouring <WG4704> <WG5723> to keep <WG5083> <WG5721> the unity <WG1775> of the Spirit <WG4151> in <WG1722> the bond <WG4886> of peace <WG1515>.

There is one <WG1520> body <WG4983>, and <WG2532> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151>, even as <WG2531> <WG2532> ye are called <WG2564> <WG5681> in <WG1722> one <WG3391> hope <WG1680> of your <WG5216> calling <WG2821>;
One <WG1520> YY <WG2962>, one <WG1520> faith <WG4102>, one <WG3391> immersion <WG908>,

One <WG1520> 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of all <WG3956>, who <WG3588> is above <WG1909> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> through <WG1223> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> all <WG3956>.
But <WG1161> unto every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of us <WG2257> is given <WG1325> <WG5681> grace <WG5485> according to <WG2596> the measure <WG3358> of the gift <WG1431> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

Wherefore <WG1352> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, When he ascended <WG305> <WG5631> up <WG1519> on high <WG5311>, he led captivity <WG162> <WG5656> captive <WG161>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> gifts <WG1390> unto men <WG444>.

(Now <WG1161> that he ascended <WG305> <WG5627>, what <WG5101> is it <WG2076> <WG5748> but <WG1508> that <WG3754> he <WG2597> also <WG2532> descended <WG2597> <WG5627> first <WG4412> into <WG1519> the lower <WG2737> parts <WG3313> of the earth <WG1093>?

He <WG846> that descended <WG2597> <WG5631> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the same also <WG2532> that ascended up <WG305> <WG5631> far above <WG5231> all <WG3956> heavens <WG3772>, that <WG2443> he might fill <WG4137> <WG5661> all things <WG3956>.)

And <WG2532> he <WG846> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> some <WG3303>, emissarys <WG652>; and <WG1161> some, prophets <WG4396>; and <WG1161> some, evangelists <WG2099>; and <WG1161> some, pastors <WG4166> and <WG2532> teachers <WG1320>;
For <WG4314> the perfecting <WG2677> of the saints <WG40>, for <WG1519> the work <WG2041> of the ministry <WG1248>, for <WG1519> the edifying <WG3619> of the body <WG4983> of Moshiach <WG5547>:

Till <WG3360> we all <WG3956> come <WG2658> <WG5661> in <WG1519> the unity <WG1775> of the faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> of the knowledge <WG1922> of the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, unto <WG1519> a perfect <WG5046> man <WG435>, unto <WG1519> the measure <WG3358> of the stature <WG2244> of the fulness <WG4138> of Moshiach <WG5547>:

That <WG2443> we henceforth be <WG5600> <WG5753> no more <WG3371> children <WG3516>, tossed to and fro <WG2831> <WG5740>, and <WG2532> carried about with <WG4064> <WG5746> every <WG3956> wind <WG417> of doctrine <WG1319>, by <WG1722> the sleight <WG2940> of men <WG444>, and cunning craftiness <WG1722> <WG3834>, whereby <WG4314> they lie in wait <WG3180> to deceive <WG4106>;

But <WG1161> speaking the truth <WG226> <WG5723> in <WG1722> love <WG26>, may grow up <WG837> <WG5661> into <WG1519> him <WG846> in all things <WG3956>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the head <WG2776>, even Moshiach <WG5547>:

From <WG1537> whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> body <WG4983> fitly joined together <WG4883> <WG5746> and <WG2532> compacted <WG4822> <WG5746> by <WG1223> that which every <WG3956> joint <WG860> supplieth <WG2024>, according <WG2596> to the effectual working <WG1753> in <WG1722> the measure <WG3358> of every <WG1538> part <WG1520> <WG3313>, maketh <WG4160> <WG5731> increase <WG838> of the body <WG4983> unto <WG1519> the edifying <WG3619> of itself <WG1438> in <WG1722> love <WG26>.

This <WG5124> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> testify <WG3143> <WG5736> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, that ye <WG5209> henceforth <WG3371> walk <WG4043> <WG5721> not <WG3371> as <WG2531> <WG2532> other <WG3062> goyim <WG1484> walk <WG4043> <WG5719>, in <WG1722> the vanity <WG3153> of their <WG846> mind <WG3563>,

Having the understanding <WG1271> darkened <WG4654> <WG5772>, being <WG5607> <WG5752> alienated <WG526> <WG5772> from the life <WG2222> of 'Elohim <WG2316> through <WG1223> the ignorance <WG52> that is <WG5607> <WG5752> in <WG1722> them <WG846>, because <WG1223> of the blindness <WG4457> of their <WG846> heart <WG2588>:

Who <WG3748> being past feeling <WG524> <WG5761> have given <WG3860> themselves <WG1438> over <WG3860> <WG5656> unto lasciviousness <WG766>, to <WG1519> work <WG2039> all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167> with <WG1722> greediness <WG4124>.
But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> have <WG3129> not <WG3756> so <WG3779> learned <WG3129> <WG5627> Moshiach <WG5547>;

If so be that <WG1489> ye have heard <WG191> <WG5656> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> have been taught <WG1321> <WG5681> by <WG1722> him <WG846>, as <WG2531> the truth <WG225> is <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1722> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>:

That ye <WG5209> put off <WG659> <WG5641> concerning <WG2596> the former <WG4387> conversation <WG391> the old <WG3820> man <WG444>, which <WG3588> is corrupt <WG5351> <WG5746> according <WG2596> to the deceitful <WG539> lusts <WG1939>;
And <WG1161> be renewed <WG365> <WG5745> in the spirit <WG4151> of your <WG5216> mind <WG3563>;

And <WG2532> that ye put on <WG1746> <WG5670> the new <WG2537> man <WG444>, which <WG3588> after <WG2596> 'Elohim <WG2316> is created <WG2936> <WG5685> in <WG1722> righteousness <WG1343> and <WG2532> true <WG225> holiness <WG3742>.

Wherefore <WG1352> putting away <WG659> <WG5642> lying <WG5579>, speak <WG2980> <WG5720> every man <WG1538> truth <WG225> with <WG3326> his <WG846> neighbour <WG4139>: for <WG3754> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> members <WG3196> one of another <WG240>.
Be ye angry <WG3710> <WG5744>, and <WG2532> sin <WG264> <WG5720> not <WG3361>: let <WG1931> not <WG3361> the sun <WG2246> go down <WG1931> <WG5720> upon <WG1909> your <WG5216> wrath <WG3950>:
Neither <WG3383> give <WG1325> <WG5720> place <WG5117> to the devil <WG1228>.

Let <WG2813> him that stole <WG2813> <WG5723> steal <WG2813> <WG5720> no more <WG3371>: but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> let him labour <WG2872> <WG5720>, working <WG2038> <WG5740> with his hands <WG5495> the thing which is good <WG18>, that <WG2443> he may have <WG2192> <WG5725> to give <WG3330> <WG5721> to him that needeth <WG5532> <WG2192> <WG5723>.

Let <WG4550> no <WG3361> <WG3956> corrupt <WG4550> communication <WG3056> proceed <WG1607> <WG5737> out of <WG1537> your <WG5216> mouth <WG4750>, but <WG235> that which <WG1536> is good <WG18> to <WG4314> the use <WG5532> of edifying <WG3619>, that <WG2443> it may minister <WG1325> <WG5632> grace <WG5485> unto the hearers <WG191> <WG5723>.

And <WG2532> grieve <WG3076> <WG5720> not <WG3361> the holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, whereby <WG1722> <WG3739> ye are sealed <WG4972> <WG5681> unto <WG1519> the day <WG2250> of redemption <WG629>.

Let <WG142> all <WG3956> bitterness <WG4088>, and <WG2532> wrath <WG2372>, and <WG2532> anger <WG3709>, and <WG2532> clamour <WG2906>, and <WG2532> evil speaking <WG988>, be put away <WG142> <WG5682> from <WG575> you <WG5216>, with <WG4862> all <WG3956> malice <WG2549>:

And <WG1161> be <WG1096> <WG5737> ye kind <WG5543> one to another <WG1519> <WG240>, tenderhearted <WG2155>, forgiving <WG5483> <WG5740> one another <WG1438>, even as <WG2531> <WG2532> 'Elohim <WG2316> for <WG1722> Moshiach's <WG5547> sake <WG1722> hath forgiven <WG5483> <WG5662> you <WG5213>.
